array.string: On the main menu choose ‘Others Transaction’
Enter 16 digits payment Account No. and press ‘Correct’
Amount to be paid, account number, and merchant name will appear on the payment confirmation page. If the information is correct, press ‘Correct’
Choose your payment account and press ‘Correct’
On the main menu choose ‘Others Transaction’
Enter 16 digits payment Account No. and press ‘Correct’
Amount to be paid, account number, and merchant name will appear on the payment confirmation page. If the information is correct, press ‘Correct’
Choose your payment account and press ‘Correct’
